snippet: The single working mother of a friend of A.'s daughter asked for a little help with her child care, but a little quickly turned into a lot.
abstract: The single working mother of a friend of A.'s daughter asked for a little help with her child care, but a little quickly turned into a lot.
lead_paragraph: "Can my daughter hang out with you guys after school?" That's the question A. hears from a fellow mother nearly every week (and sometimes more often). After school, or when she needs to work a weekend or an evening shift, this mother seems to have settled on A. as her go-to emergency baby-sitting option.

headline.main: Parental Quandary: The Mooching Working Mother
